description: Numbers n such that the factorizations of n through n+5 have the same number of primes (including multiplicities).
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
crossrefs: Cf. similar sequences from n to: A045941 (n+4), A123103 (n+6), A123201 (n+7).
author: _David W. Wilson_
